articles.title: Choe Thae Bok Meets British Delegation
articles.content:
Choe Thae Bok Meets British Delegation
Pyongyang, February 5 (KCNA) -- Choe Thae Bok, chairman of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, met a British parliamentary delegation led by Member of the House of Lords David Alton who is chairman of the British-DPRK All-Party Parliamentary Group, which paid a courtesy call on him, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Thursday and had a friendly talk with it.
					 Present there were Ri Jong Hyok, chairman of the DPRK-U.K. Friendship Parliamentary Group who is deputy to the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, and Peter Hughes, ambassador of the United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland to the DPRK.

articles.title: DPRK FM Greets His Libyan Counterpart
articles.content:
DPRK FM Greets His Libyan Counterpart
Pyongyang, February 5 (KCNA) -- Foreign Minister Pak Ui Chun sent a message of greetings to Abdulrahman Mohamed Shalgham, secretary for Foreign Liaison and International Cooperation of Libya, on Jan. 19 on the occasion of the 35th anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic ties between the DPRK and Libya.
					 Expressing the belief that the good bilateral relations of friendship and cooperation would grow stronger in conformity with the interests and desire of the two peoples in the future, too, the message wished Abdulrahman Mohamed Shalgham good health and great success in his responsible work.

articles.title: National Seminar on Kim Jong Il's Immortal Feats
articles.content:
National Seminar on Kim Jong Il's Immortal Feats
Pyongyang, February 5 (KCNA) -- A national seminar on the immortal feats General Secretary
					Kim Jong Il has performed by leading the general advance of the Songun revolution and thus laying an eternal foundation for building a rich and powerful nation was held at the People's Palace of Culture on Thursday.
					 Attending the seminar were Choe Thae Bok, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, Kim Yong Jin, minister of Education, officials of national institutions and party, administrative and working people's organizations in Pyongyang and officials of scientific, educational, literary and art and media institutions, party cadre-training institutions and those in the field of the preservation of revolutionary relics. 
					
					 The seminar heard papers presented by Kim Jung Hyop, editor-in-chief of the Rodong Sinmun, Jang Yun Gon, director of the International Affairs Institute, Kim Yong Ho, director of the Cabinet Secretariat, and others in which they explained and proved at length the immortal feats Kim Jong Il has performed in building a great prosperous powerful socialist nation. 
					
					 They in their papers systematically explained the greatness of Kim Jong Il, who helped the servicepersons and people emerge strong in mental power by successfully embodying the Juche-oriented theory of ideology. 
					
					 The DPRK has dashed forward like the wind towards the eminence of a great prosperous powerful socialist nation, winning victories in the fierce confrontation with the imperialist reactionaries, they noted, adding that this is the brilliant fruition of Kim Jong Il's Songun revolutionary leadership.
					
					 Kim Jong Il has bolstered the revolutionary armed forces of the DPRK as a matchless army with his original Songun politics and foiled all the evermore undisguised challenges of the imperialists and their moves to provoke a war by invincible armed forces, thus protecting the dignity of the country and the nation and their supreme interests.
					
					 They referred to the fact that Kim Jong Il has made a forced march for field guidance, bringing about a landmark phase in building an economic power and ushering in a great heyday in music art in the Songun era.
					
					 Speakers called for deeply studying the immortal feats Kim Jong Il has performed for the country and the revolution and more courageously waging the general charge to fling open the gate to a thriving nation, united close around the party.

articles.title: Friendly Meeting with Members of Missions of International Organizations Here Held
articles.content:
Friendly Meeting with Members of Missions of International Organizations Here Held
Pyongyang, February 5 (KCNA) -- The Ministry of Foreign Affairs arranged a friendly gathering with members of the missions of international organizations here on Feb. 5 on the occasion of the birthday of General Secertary Kim Jong Il.
					 Present there on invitation were Torben Due, an acting UN resident coordinator to the DPRK, and other members of the missions of international organizations here.
					
					 On hand were officials of the Foreign Ministry including Vice-Minister Pak Kil Yon.
					
					 Speeches were made at the meeting.

articles.title: Film Show and Friendly Gathering Held
articles.content:
Film Show and Friendly Gathering Held
Pyongyang, February 5 (KCNA) -- The Ministry of Culture Thursday arranged a film show and friendly gathering in honor of officials in charge of cultural relations of different embassies here at Taedongmun Cinema on the occasion of the birthday of General Seceratry Kim Jong Il. 
					 Present at the film show and friendly gathering were Vice-Minister of Culture Paek Han Su and other officials of the ministry and movie men. 
					
					 The participants watched Korean feature film "Lieutenant at that time." 
					
					 Then followed a friendly gathering.
					
					 The participants talked to one another about the greatness of Kim Jong Il who has wisely led the Korean people in their drive for building a great prosperous powerful nation with his unique Songun leadership and the need to boost the cooperation and exchanges in the field of culture and art among countries, deepening friendly feelings.

articles.title: Iranian Photo and Handicraft Exhibition Held
articles.content:
Iranian Photo and Handicraft Exhibition Held
Pyongyang, February 5 (KCNA) -- An Iranian photo and handicraft exhibition was held at the Chollima Hall of Culture on Thursday on the occasion of the 30th anniversary of the victory of the Islamic revolution in Iran.
					 Present there were Jon Yong Jin, vice-chairman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries who is also vice-chairman of the DPRK-Iran Friendship Association, officials concerned and working people in the city.
					
					 Iranian Ambassador to the DPRK Morteza Moradian and staff members of the Iranian embassy here were on hand.
					
					 Present there on invitation were diplomatic envoys of various countries here.
					
					 Speeches were made there.

articles.title: State Academic Degrees and Titles Awarded to Intellectuals of Merits
articles.content:
State Academic Degrees and Titles Awarded to Intellectuals of Merits
Pyongyang, February 5 (KCNA) -- State academic degrees and titles were awarded to intellectuals who made fresh successes in the scientific research and the education of younger generation on the occasion of the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 In the awarding ceremony held on Thursday, the title of candidate academician was awarded to Kim Wang Sop, researcher of the Academy of Social Sciences.
					
					 The title of professor was awarded to Kim Myong Sok, chief of a department of Kim Jong Suk University of Education, Pak Kon Sik and Ho Jun Sop, heads of departments of Hamhung University of Chemical Engineering, Han Tong Hyok, researcher of the State Academy of Sciences, Choe Hui Nam, researcher of Hamhung Branch of the State Academy of Sciences, and others. 
					
					 Degree of doctor was conferred on Ri Jae Gyong and Ri Wan Sop, researchers of the Chollima Steel Complex, Jon Kwang Hye, researcher of the Sunchon Vinalon Complex, Jo Kwang, chief of a department of Kim Il Sung University, and others. Degree of associate professor was awarded to 73 persons.

articles.title: School Youth and Children to Tour Mt. Paektu
articles.content:
School Youth and Children to Tour Mt. Paektu
Pyongyang, February 5 (KCNA) -- School youth and children from across the country left Hyesan, Ryanggang Province, to visit General Secretary Kim Jong Il's birthplace in the Paektusan secret camp on the occasion of the February holiday.
					 A meeting for starting their study tour took place in front of the Victorious Battle of Pochonbo Memorial Tower in Hyesan City on Wednesday.
					
					 Present there were officials of the youth league, young working people and school youth and children from across the country.
					
					 The participants laid floral baskets and flowers before the statue of President Kim Il Sung at the tower to pay homage to him.
					
					 A reporter and speakers at the meeting said that it is their great honor to visit Kim Jong Il's birthplace in the secret camp, a sacred place of revolution where he was born as the bright star of Mt. Paektu, on the occasion of his birthday.
					
					 They stressed that all the youth league officials and school youth and children should deeply grasp the immortal revolutionary exploits of the peerlessly great persons during their visit to the revolutionary battle sites and historic sites in the area of Mt. Paektu along the course of study tour pioneered by Kim Jong Il.
					
					 After the meeting the participants started their march.

articles.title: New Feature Film Produced
articles.content:
New Feature Film Produced
 Pyongyang, February 5 (KCNA) -- Feature film "Appearance of Soldier" was produced by the April 25 Film Studio of the Korean People's Army. 
					 The film impressively depicts a soldier of the KPA saving revolutionary comrades by covering the exploding hand grenade with his body in an accident. 
					
					 Through the hero of the film, the film truthfully represents the appearance of the soldiers of the KPA glorifying their service in defending the socialist homeland with intense loyalty to the Party and the leader, noble sense of moral obligation and revolutionary comradeship.

articles.title: Winner of First World Intelligence Competition
articles.content:
Winner of First World Intelligence Competition
Pyongyang, February 5 (KCNA) -- There are many athletes who let the national flag of the DPRK fly in international contests, enhancing the national prestige.
					 Among them is Jo Tae Won, player of the Korean Paduk (go) Association, who bagged a gold medal at the open paduk individuals in the 1st World Intelligence Competition held in Beijing in October last year.
					
					 He booked the final birth, overpowering all the rivals from various countries and regions. At the final-stage of the competition, he outrivaled the opponent by employing protean skills to become the winner of the first Intelligence Olympics.
					
					 He displayed a high-level of technique at the World Amateur Paduk Championship held in Juche 94 (2005) to earn the world fame. His special ability is sharp attack and the spirit of turning the game situation favorably without losing confidence till the last moments.
					
					 It is said that for this purpose, he had striven to acquire high technique and resources such as correctly judging the situation and reading tricks from the five year of age.
					
					 He was very clever and interested in paduk from his younger days. The state which found his paduk ability let him participate in international games in his teens.
					
					 He, a Merited Athlete, is trying hard to inspire the people in the efforts for building a great, prosperous and powerful nation with another gold medal.

articles.title: Popular Masses, Propelling Force of Social History
articles.content:
Popular Masses, Propelling Force of Social History
Pyongyang, February 5 (KCNA) -- The Juche idea newly elucidates that the masses of the people are the propelling force of history. 
					 This means that the masses of the people stand in the center of history and the social movement is undertaken by them.
					
					 Human history is the course of the social movement of the popular masses, in other words the course of the movement of the propelling force. This is because the masses demand the development of society and they are the very one who undertakes its development.
					
					 The social movement itself is unthinkable and there cannot be the development of history apart from the masses.
					
					 The masses, the master of construction, are the decisive factor in remaking nature and developing society and the possessor of the most powerful creative ability.
					
					 All the things of society are created, history is advanced and revolution promoted by their inexhaustible strength.
					
					 The masses make material wealth and ideological and cultural wealth of society by remaking nature and developing productive forces.
					
					 The masses are legitimately the propelling force of history, as they create all the things of society and blaze the path of history and advance it.
					
					 The active role of the masses in the development of social history increases as their position is elevated and their strength augmented through the transformation of nature and society.
					
					 Although the masses of the people are the propelling force of history, they can take their position and play their role as the independent propelling force of history, awakened and organized, only under the correct leadership of the Party and the leader.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak's Moves for Confrontation with DPRK under Fire
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak's Moves for Confrontation with DPRK under Fire
Pyongyang, February 5 (KCNA) -- The South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification on Jan. 30 released a statement calling for checking and shattering the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors' moves for confrontation with the DPRK.
					 The statement accused Lee and the "Grand National Party" of rendering the south Korean economy bankrupt, murdering innocent civilians and pushing the situation to the brink of war through their moves for a war and confrontation.
					
					 Recalling that the Lee group is hell-bent on scattering leaflets and staging exercises for a war of aggression against the north, talking about the "unification under the liberal and democratic system" despite the strong resistance of the 70 million Koreans, the statement noted that it is the only way of weathering the worst crisis to force Lee to step down and get the GNP disbanded immediately.
					
					 The statement demanded Lee and the GNP halt at once the saber-rattling for war and confrontation and step down without delay.
					
					 It declared that the above-said organization would join the 70 million Koreans in the actions to resolutely foil the racket of the U.S. imperialists and the Lee group for war and confrontation.

articles.title: Puppet Authorities' Suppression of Hanchong Assailed
articles.content:
Puppet Authorities' Suppression of Hanchong Assailed
Pyongyang, February 5 (KCNA) -- The Action Headquarters of the Youth and Students Solidarity for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration for Forcing the Lee Myung Bak Regime to Step Down in south Korea released a statement on Feb. 1 condemning the puppet authorities for suppressing the south Korean Council of Youth Organizations (Hanchong).
					 The statement accused the supreme court of making a decision labeling Hanchong an "enemy-benefiting organization" on the charge of violation of the "National Security Law," an anachronistic evil law, on Jan. 30.
					
					 It charged that the decision made by the court at a time when the "government" and the ruling party are working hard to railroad the "Lee Myung Bak's evil laws" aimed at putting all the people under dictatorship is little short of admitting themselves that they are nothing but waiting maids of the Lee dictatorial regime.
					
					 Stating that it is intolerable to label Hanchong, a youth organization for solidarity and alliance, an "enemy-benefiting organization," the statement declared that the action headquarters would carry on its actions to the last for the retraction of the unjust decision and the repeal of the NSL.

articles.title: DPRK Significant Days to Be Marked in Different Countries
articles.content:
DPRK Significant Days to Be Marked in Different Countries
Pyongyang, February 5 (KCNA) -- A Peruvian national preparatory committee and Venezuelan and Indonesian preparatory committees were inaugurated between Jan. 27 and 29 to commemorate the Day of the Sun and celebrate February 16.
					 The chairman of the People's Front of Workers, Peasants and Students of Peru, the general secretary of the C.C., the Peruvian Communist Party, the general secretary of the C.C., the Communist Party of Peru (Red Motherland), the chairman of the New Left Movement of Peru, the general secretary of the Revolutionary Socialist Party of Peru, the chairman of the Peruvian Coordinating Committee of Politics and Society, the chairman of the Peruvian Committee for Supporting the Independent and Peaceful Reunification of Korea and the secretary general of the Peruvian-Korean Institute of Culture and Friendship were elected co-chairmen of the Peruvian national preparatory committee.
					
					 Omar Lopez, chairman of the Venezuelan National Society for the Study of the Juche Idea, was elected chairman of the Venezuelan preparatory committee and Ristiyanto, chairman of the Indonesia-Korea Association for Friendship and Cultural Exchange, chairman of the Indonesian preparatory committee.
					
					 The Peruvian national preparatory committee decided to organize a meeting and other colorful events in the capital city and local areas and widely introduce the greatness of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il through media until April 15.
					
					 The Venezuelan preparatory committee set a commendation and celebration period from mid-February to the end of April and the Indonesian preparatory committee from Feb. 11 to April 15. And they decided to hold colorful events in the period.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il dirige importantes empresas industrials
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il dirige importantes empresas industriales
 Pyongyang, 5 de febrero (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, dirigio sobre el terreno el Complejo de Vinalon 8 de Febrero y el Complejo de Maquinaria de Ryongsong que estan agitados por producir un nuevo y gran auge revolucionario.
					  Le acompanaron el secretario y el jefe de departamento, del CC del PTC, Kim Ki Nam y Pak Nam Gi.
					
					  El Dirigente estuvo primero en el Complejo de Vinalon 8 de Febrero.
					
					  Luego de escuchar explicaciones ante el plano de los procesos de los talleres, que pronto entraran en la fase crucial de produccion, se entero detalladamente del estado de renovacion tecnica y de produccion recorriendo varios lugares incluyendo el taller del plastificante.
					
					  Al pasar revista a los recien reconstruidos procesos de produccion, se mostro muy satisfecho de que los funcionarios, los obreros y los tecnicos del complejo inventaron e instalaron decenas de equipos y cumplieron numerosos proyectos de construccion con las fuerzas y tecnicas propias y evaluo altamente sus exitos de lucha.
					
					 Senalo que bajo la consigna de "!Cumplimos si lo decide el Partido!", los trabajadores del complejo renovaron a la altura del nuevo siglo la fisonomia de su fabrica en las tan dificiles condiciones manifestando en alto grado su espiritu revolucionario de autoconfianza y posibilitaron de esta manera poner de pleno manifiesto el poderio de la industria jucheana.
					
					 Continuo que este exito esplendido es una muestra directa de la inagotable potencia espiritual del pueblo coreano que materializa de un tiron cualquier cosa que demande el partido. 
					
					  Son muy importantes la posicion y el papel que juega este complejo en la construccion de una gran potencia prospera, senalo y presento las tareas que incumben a esta fabrica.
					
					  Dijo que cuando termine la reconstruccion de la segunda fase del complejo, seran acondicionados a perfeccion todos los procesos capaces de producir distintos articulos con los productos intermedios de vinalon y anadio que esto producira un viraje trascendental en la industria quimica.
					
					  Encomio que los obreros del complejo impulsan ambiciosos proyectos para perfeccionar nuevos procesos con la decision de fidelidad de glorificar eternamente las hazanas de direccion del Presidente Kim Il Sung, fundador de la industria de vinalon, y dispenso grandes benevolencias al resolver personalmente los problemas pendientes.
					
					  Al asegurar que el complejo podra acabar en un corto tiempo la reconstruccion de la segunda fase porque cuenta con los obreros fieles al Partido y a la revolucion, la firme base economica ya preparada y el cuantioso colectivo de tecnicos competentes, indico el rumbo y remedios para el particular.
					
					  A continuacion, el Dirigente dirigio sobre el terreno el Complejo de Maquinaria de Ryongsong.
					
					  Al recorrer los procesos de produccion, entre otros, el taller de compresor y el de hierro fundido y moldeado, que esta en plena construccion, hizo conocimiento detallado del estado de produccion y construccion y estimulo cordialmente a los obreros luchando por incrementar trascendentalmente la produccion.
					
					  Al enterarse minuciosamente de la estructura, la eficiencia y el principio de operacion de las maquinas modernas, incluyendo los compresores de nuevo tipo, enfilados en la extensa area del taller, se puso muy contento de que los obreros de Ryongsong avanzan por la unica senda de incesantes saltos.
					
					 Califico de gran exito el hecho de que los obreros de Ryongsong, que vinieron acatando con fidelidad la idea y la direccion del partido, sobrecumplieron su plan productivo aun en los dificiles periodos de la "marcha penosa" y la forzada, inventaron y fabricaron las maquinas ultramodernas con las fuerzas y tecnicas propias manifestando altamente el espiritu revolucionario de la lucha tenaz y la materializacion a ultranza.
					
					  Aprecio altamente los meritos de ellos y envio saludo a todos los obreros, tecnicos y funcionarios.
					
					  Gracias al firme apoyo de numerosas, potentes y grandes bases de maquinaria como este complejo, que exalta el poderio de la economia nacional independiente, pudimos realizar brillantemente en un corto tiempo la industrializacion socialista e incrementar con rapidez la potencia economica del pais, subrayo y apunto que esta gran potencialidad nos pone optimistas de la victoria de la causa de construccion de una gran potencia prospera.
					
					  Destacando que este complejo desempena un papel muy importante en las labores para abrir las puertas a la gran potencia prospera, presento las tareas programaticas que se presentan ante el complejo.
					
					  Ahora en que se libra energicamente la ofensiva final para construir una gran potencia prospera, todos los sectores de la economia nacional demandan mas maquinas y equipos que nunca, dijo y agrego que los obreros de Ryongsong deben innovar y avanzar de continuo con aquel espiritu y temple con que habia sorprendido al mundo al fabricar en el periodo posbelico las maquinas de gran tamano con escasos recursos.
					
					  Al afirmar que es muy grande la esperanza del partido cifrada en este complejo, asevero que los obreros de aqui deben volver a dar saltos agigantados en la produccion de maquinaria, incluyendo los equipos para la modernizacion de la industria clave, dedicando toda su inteligencia y pasion.

articles.title: Simposio nacional sobre inmortales hazanas de Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Simposio nacional sobre inmortales hazanas de Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, 5 de febrero (ATCC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 5 en el Palacio Cultural del Pueblo el simposio nacional sobre las inmortales hazanas del Dirigente Kim Jong Il quien al conducir a la cabeza la marcha general de la revolucion del Songun (priorizacion militar), echo la base eterna de la construccion de la patria prospera.
					En el acto participaron Choe Thae Bok, secretario del CC del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Kim Yong Jin, ministro de Educacion, y otros cuadros de los organismos del partido, la administracion y las organizaciones de masas del centro y la ciudad de Pyongyang, los funcionarios de los dominios de ciencia, educacion, literatura y arte, prensa e informacion, organos de la formacion de cuadros del partido y  de la rama de conservacion de reliquias historicas de la revolucion.
					
					En la ocasion, Kim Jung Hyop, redactor en jefe de la Editora del Periodico Rodong Sinmun, Jang Yun Gon, director del Instituto de Asuntos Internacionales, Kim Yong Ho, director del Secretariado del Consejo de Ministros, y otros hicieron publicas las disertaciones que explican y argumentan con profundidad las inmortales hazanas del Dirigente acumuladas en la construccion de una gran potencia prospera socialista.
					
					Los oradores explicaron de manera sistematica la noble personalidad del Dirigente quien al materializar brillantemente la autoctona ideologia, formo al ejercito y al pueblo de Corea como los fuertes en lo espiritual.
					
					Enfatizaron que gracias a la direccion del Dirigente Kim Jong Il sobre la revolucion mediante el Songun, la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea avanza galopante hacia la cima de la gran potencia prospera socialista logrando victoria tras victoria en el agudo enfrentamiento con los imperialistas y otros reaccionarios.
					
					Al practicar la original politica de Songun, el Dirigente consolido las fuerzas armadas revolucionarias como invencible ejercito poderoso y frustro a cada paso con el invencible poderio militar  toda clase de desafios y las maniobras de provocacion de guerra de los imperialistas que se tornan cada dia mas perversas y de esta manera,  defendio la dignidad y los intereses supremos del pais y la nacion, senalaron.
					
					Agregaron que mediante la dinamica direccion sobre el terreno, el Dirigente dejo abierta la coyuntura de viraje en la construccion de la potencia economica y abrio la era dorada de la musica y arte de la epoca del Songun.
					
					Los oradores destacaron la necesidad de investigar y experimentar profundamente las inmortales hazanas del Dirigente acumuladas ante la patria y la revolucion y desarrollar con mas valentia la ofensiva general para abrir las puertas a la gran potencia prospera uniendose solidamente en torno al Partido.

articles.title: MINREX ofrece encuentro de amistad con extranjeros
articles.content:
MINREX ofrece encuentro de amistad con extranjeros
Pyongyang, 5 de febrero (ATCC) -- Con motivo del dia de nacimiento (16 de febrero) del Dirigente Kim Jong Il, el Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea ofrecio este jueves un encuentro de amistad con los miembros de las representaciones de las organizaciones internacionales acreditadas en Corea.
					Al acto fueron invitados Toben Duye, coordinador permanente interino de la ONU y los miembros de las representaciones de las organizaciones internacionales en Corea.
					
					  Estuvieron presentes  alli el vicecanciller coreano Pak Kil Yon y otros funcionarios del MINREX.
					
					En el encuentro hubo discursos.

articles.title: Ministerio de Cultura organiza actos para extranjeros
articles.content:
Ministerio de Cultura organiza actos para extranjeros
Pyongyang, 5 de febrero (ATCC) -- Con motivo del cumpleanos (16 de febrero) del Dirigente
					Kim Jong Il, el Ministerio de Cultura organizo el dia 5 en el capitalino Cine Taedongmun la proyeccion filmica y encuentro de amistad en honor de los funcionarios encargados de asuntos culturales de las embajadas de varios paises en Corea.
					En la ocasion estuvieron presentes el viceministro Paek Han Su y otros funcionarios del Ministerio de Cultura y los cineastas.
					
					Los participantes vieron la pelicula coreana "El teniente de aquel dia".
					
					Acto seguido, se realizo el encuentro de amistad.
					
					Los participantes profundizaron el sentimiento de amistad departiendo sobre la noble personalidad del Dirigente Kim Jong Il, quien en virtud de su original politica de Songun (priorizacion militar), guia sabiamente la lucha del pueblo coreano por construir una gran potencia prospera y sobre el problema de desarrollar la cooperacion y el intercambio entre los paises en la rama cultural y artistica.
